ci_support_linux_64_.yaml:
cdt_name:
- cos6
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-cos7-x86_64
go_compiler:
- go-nocgo
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.description:
Nebula lets you seamlessly connect computers anywhere in the world.
Nebula is portable, and runs on Linux, OSX, Windows, iOS, and Android.
It can be used to connect a small number of computers,
but is also able to connect tens of thousands of computers.
about.summary: Nebula is a scalable overlay networking tool with a focus on performance, simplicity and security.

name: nebula

about.description:
Nebula lets you seamlessly connect computers anywhere in the world.
Nebula is portable, and runs on Linux, OSX, Windows, iOS, and Android.
It can be used to connect a small number of computers,
but is also able to connect tens of thousands of computers.
about.summary: Nebula is a scalable overlay networking tool with a focus on performance, simplicity and security.

raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "nebula" %}
{% set version = "1.6.0" %}

package:
  name: {{ name }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://github.com/slackhq/{{ name }}/archive/refs/tags/v{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: b16638b99d80a4ae6373f7757a0064dc0defd3f9e165617e7b5c3be9e64d3605

build:
  number: 0

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ compiler("go") }}
    - make  # [not win]
    - m2-make  # [win]
    - go-licenses

test:
  commands:
    - nebula -help
    - nebula-cert ca -name "Company"

about:
  home: https://github.com/slackhq/nebula
  summary: Nebula is a scalable overlay networking tool with a focus on performance, simplicity and security.
  description: |
    Nebula lets you seamlessly connect computers anywhere in the world.
    Nebula is portable, and runs on Linux, OSX, Windows, iOS, and Android.
    It can be used to connect a small number of computers, 
    but is also able to connect tens of thousands of computers.
  license: MIT
  license_family: MIT
  license_file:
    - LICENSE
    - library_licenses/

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - MichaelKora
    - wolfv

about.description:
Nebula lets you seamlessly connect computers anywhere in the world.
Nebula is portable, and runs on Linux, OSX, Windows, iOS, and Android.
It can be used to connect a small number of computers,
but is also able to connect tens of thousands of computers.
about.summary: Nebula is a scalable overlay networking tool with a focus on performance, simplicity and security.
